title: Design and Utilization of IoT-Based Educational Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers focusing on integrating IoT technology into curricula. Requires content design considering smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: They can systematically perform the analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation phases of an IoT curriculum by applying the ADDIE model
They can select and structure educational content based on the IT2017 guidelines and IoT application cases from industrial settings
They can design and operate effective IoT experiments and project activities even in constrained technological environments (primarily smartphone-based)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
